chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
q: X -> Prop
p: X -> Prop

Goal:
decidable p -> decidable q -> decidable (fun x : X => p x /\ q x)

Premises:
decidable = fun (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) => exists f : X -> bool, decider f P : forall X : Type, (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments decidable {X}%type_scope _%function_scope
dec_compl : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop), decidable p -> decidable (fun x : X => ~ p x)
discrete = fun X : Type => decidable (fun '(x, y) => x = y) : Type -> Prop Arguments discrete _%type_scope
decidable_iff : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop), decidable p < -> inhabited (forall x : X, dec (p x))
eq_sig2_nondep : forall u v : {_ : ?A | ?B & ?C}, proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Prop] ?C : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Prop]
eq_sig2 : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}) (p0 : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)), eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p0 = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
VectorDef.Exists2_cons_hd : forall (P : ?A -> ?B -> Prop) (m : nat) (x1 : ?A) (x2 : ?B) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B m), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Exists2 P (VectorDef.cons ?A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B x2 m v2) where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [X : Type p : X -> Prop q : X -> Prop |- Type]
PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_unique_alt : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> (forall q : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.divide q p <-> PeanoNat.Nat.divide q n /\ PeanoNat.Nat.divide q m) -> PeanoNat.Nat.gcd n m = p
dec_decidable' : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> {f : X -> bool | forall x : X, p x < -> f x = true}
PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_unique : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> PeanoNat.Nat.divide p n -> PeanoNat.Nat.divide p m -> (forall q : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.divide q n -> PeanoNat.Nat.divide q m -> PeanoNat.Nat.divide q p) -> PeanoNat.Nat.gcd n m = p
BinNat.N.lcm_unique : forall n m p : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.le BinNums.N0 p -> BinNat.N.divide n p -> BinNat.N.divide m p -> (forall q : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.divide n q -> BinNat.N.divide m q -> BinNat.N.divide p q) -> BinNat.N.lcm n m = p
BinPosDef.Pos.compare_cont = fix compare_cont (r : comparison) (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct y} : comparison := match x with | BinNums.xI p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => compare_cont r p q | BinNums.xO q => compare_cont Gt p q | BinNums.xH => Gt end | BinNums.xO p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => compare_cont Lt p q | BinNums.xO q => compare_cont r p q | BinNums.xH => Gt end | BinNums.xH => match y with | BinNums.xH => r | _ => Lt end end : comparison -> BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> comparison Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.compare_cont _ (_ _)%positive_scope
decider = fun (X : Type) (f : X -> bool) (P : X -> Prop) => forall x : X, reflects (f x) (P x) : forall X : Type, (X -> bool) -> (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments decider {X}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
BinNat.N.divide = fun p q : BinNums.N => exists r : BinNums.N, q = BinNat.N.mul r p : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> Prop Arguments BinNat.N.divide (_ _)%N_scope
BinNat.N.add_lt_le_mono : forall n m p q : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.lt n m -> BinNat.N.le p q -> BinNat.N.lt (BinNat.N.add n p) (BinNat.N.add m q)
BinPosDef.Pos.sub_mask = with sub_mask (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct y} : BinPosDef.Pos.mask := match x with | BinNums.xI p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinPosDef.Pos.double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinPosDef.Pos.succ_double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos (BinNums.xO p) end | BinNums.xO p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinPosDef.Pos.succ_double_mask (sub_mask_carry p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinPosDef.Pos.double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos (BinPosDef.Pos.pred_double p) end | BinNums.xH => match y with | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsNul | _ => BinPosDef.Pos.IsNeg end end with sub_mask_carry (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct y} : BinPos...
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
BinNatDef.N.pow = fun n p : BinNums.N => match p with | BinNums.N0 => BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH | BinNums.Npos p0 => match n with | BinNums.N0 => BinNums.N0 | BinNums.Npos q => BinNums.Npos (BinPos.Pos.pow q p0) end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.pow (_ _)%N_scope
BinPos.Pos.add_comm : forall p q : BinNums.positive, BinPos.Pos.add p q = BinPos.Pos.add q p
QArith_base.Qlt_compat = fun (p q : QArith_base.Q) (H : QArith_base.Qeq p q) (r s : QArith_base.Q) (H' : QArith_base.Qeq r s) => (fun lemma : QArith_base.Qlt p r <-> QArith_base.Qcompare p r = Lt => trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism iff_Transitive (QArith_base.Qlt p r) (QArith_base.Qcompare p r = Lt) lemma (QArith_base.Qlt q s) (QArith_base.Qlt q s) (eq_proper_proxy (QArith_base.Qlt q s))) (QArith_base.Qlt_alt p r) ((fun lemma : QArith_base.Qlt q s <-> QArith_base.Qcompare q s = Lt => trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (Equivalence_PER iff_equivalence) (QArith_base.Qlt q s) (QArith_base.Qcompare q s = Lt) lemma) (QArith_base.Qlt_alt q s) ((fun lemma : QArith_base.Qeq p q =>...
BinPos.Pos.compare_cont_Lt_Gt : forall p q : BinNums.positive, BinPos.Pos.compare_cont Lt p q = Gt < -> BinPos.Pos.gt p q
BinNatDef.N.eqb = fun n m : BinNums.N => match n with | BinNums.N0 => match m with | BinNums.N0 => true | BinNums.Npos _ => false end | BinNums.Npos p => match m with | BinNums.N0 => false | BinNums.Npos q => BinPos.Pos.eqb p q end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> bool Arguments BinNatDef.N.eqb (_ _)%N_scope
QArith_base.Qeq = fun p q : QArith_base.Q => BinInt.Z.mul (QArith_base.Qnum p) (BinNums.Zpos (QArith_base.Qden q)) = BinInt.Z.mul (QArith_base.Qnum q) (BinNums.Zpos (QArith_base.Qden p)) : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Arguments QArith_base.Qeq (_ _)%Q_scope
BinNatDef.N.add = fun n m : BinNums.N => match n with | BinNums.N0 => m | BinNums.Npos p => match m with | BinNums.N0 => n | BinNums.Npos q => BinNums.Npos (BinPos.Pos.add p q) end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.add (_ _)%N_scope
BinPos.Pos.compare_cont_spec : forall (p q : BinNums.positive) (c : comparison), BinPos.Pos.compare_cont c p q = BinPos.Pos.switch_Eq c (BinPos.Pos.compare p q)
List.Exists_or_inv : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), List.Exists (fun x : A => P x \/ Q x) l -> List.Exists P l \/ List.Exists Q l
Inductive sig2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) : Type := exist2 : forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> {x : A | P x & Q x} Arguments sig2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%type_scope Arguments exist2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
BinInt.Pos2Z.add_pos_pos : forall p q : BinNums.positive, BinInt.Z.add (BinNums.Zpos p) (BinNums.Zpos q) = BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.add p q)
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
BinInt.Z.le_trans : forall n m p : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> BinInt.Z.le m p -> BinInt.Z.le n p
BinInt.Z.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> BinInt.Z.lt m p -> BinInt.Z.lt n p
PeanoNat.Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
BinInt.Z.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt n m -> BinInt.Z.le m p -> BinInt.Z.lt n p
ssrbool.rel = fun T : Type => T -> ssrbool.pred T : Type -> Type Arguments ssrbool.rel _%type_scope
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
BinNatDef.N.testbit = fun a n : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => false | BinNums.Npos p => BinPos.Pos.testbit p n end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> bool Arguments BinNatDef.N.testbit (_ _)%N_scope
CompSpec = fun (A : Type) (eq lt : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) => CompareSpec (eq x y) (lt x y) (lt y x) : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> A -> A -> comparison -> Prop Arguments CompSpec {A}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
BinInt.Z.lt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinNat.N.le = fun x y : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> Prop Arguments BinNat.N.le (_ _)%N_scope
BinInt.Z.gt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.gt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinNat.N.lt = fun x y : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> Prop Arguments BinNat.N.lt (_ _)%N_scope

```coq
intros X q_dec p_dec.
unfold decidable in q_dec, p_dec.
destruct q_dec as [f_q q_dec'].
destruct p_dec as [f_p p_dec'].
exists (fun x => andb (f_p x) (f_q x)).
intros x.
destruct (p_dec' x) as [H1 | H2].
- destruct (q_dec' x) as [H3 | H4].
  + split.
    * rewrite H1. reflexivity.
    * rewrite H3. reflexivity.
  + split.
    * rewrite H1. reflexivity.
    * rewrite H4. reflexivity.
- destruct (q_dec' x) as [H3 | H4].
  + split.
    * rewrite H2. inversion 1.
    * rewrite H3. reflexivity.
  + split.
    * rewrite H2. inversion 1.
    * rewrite H4. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros X q_dec p_dec. unfold decidable in q_dec, p_dec. destruct q_dec as [f_q q_dec']. destruct p_dec as [f_p p_dec']. exists (fun x => andb (f_p x) (f_q x)). intros x. destruct (p_dec' x) as [H1 | H2]. - destruct (q_dec' x) as [H3 | H4]. + split. * rewrite H1. reflexivity. * rewrite H3. reflexivity. + split. * rewrite H1. reflexivity. * rewrite H4. reflexivity. - destruct (q_dec' x) as [H3 | H4]. + split. * rewrite H2. inversion 1. * rewrite H3. reflexivity. + split. * rewrite H2. inversion 1. * rewrite H4. reflexivity.
